text: Sándor Egeresi (; ; 25 June 1964 – 5 September 2021) was a Hungarian-Serbian politician, engineer and lawyer. He was born in Bačka Topola, SFR Yugoslavia. He was a member and president of the Alliance of Vojvodina Hungarians Party. Egeresi was President of the Assembly of Vojvodina from 2008 until 2012. Egeresi died on 5 September 2021 in Novi Sad, Serbia at the age of 57.Sándor Egeresi is dead ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Serbian politicians Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Legislative speakers
title: Sándor Egeresi
